definition: pedal (in a car, on a piano etc)/treadle/footstool/footrest/footboard
to tread/to stamp/to step on/to press a pedal/to investigate on the spot
to catch sight of in a doorway (old)
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: Release the Foot Switch when the Calibration Indicator reaches its set position.
sentences.chinese: 当刻度指示器指向规定的位置，放开脚踏板。

sentences.english: The right peddle of your bicycle has come loose; you'd better fix it.
sentences.chinese: 你的自行车右脚踏板松动了，最好修一修。

sentences.english: Extra steps were required because I am installing adjustable rudder pedals.
sentences.chinese: 额外的步骤需要，因为我安装可调式舵踏板。

sentences.english: Had taken a step big or it is easy to walk in footplate brim trip.
sentences.chinese: 迈步过大或踩在踏板边缘容易摔倒等。

sentences.english: Petra had been with this swan-shaped boat for years.
sentences.chinese: 蓓特拉已经陪伴在这只天鹅形踏板船身边多年了。

sentences.english: It with make the sound machine pedal similar, is good assistant of necessary performer.
sentences.chinese: 它与制音器踏板一样，是演奏者不可或缺的好助手。

sentences.english: I am a drummer myself, and what Dave does in this video does not require a double kick pedal at all.
sentences.chinese: 我自己的鼓手，和戴夫在这个视频不需要双一脚踏板。

sentences.english: She pressed on the accelerator,roaring the engine.
sentences.chinese: 她踩下油门踏板，使引擎隆隆作响。

sentences.english: This pedal sounds as good as most reverbs out there.
sentences.chinese: 这踏板的声音一样好最混响出来。

sentences.english: The pistons go up and down as a person stands on lever devices- treadles- and uses a natural walking motion.
sentences.chinese: 人站在杠杆设置踏板上来回走动，活塞就会上下移动。

sentences.english: But he said even Ostertag wouldn't have been able to reach the pedals.
sentences.chinese: 但是他说即使OSTERTAG也不太能够到脚踏板。

sentences.english: To downshift without using your brakes, simply let off the gas and wait until your speed decreases.
sentences.chinese: 减挡不用刹车，只是抬起加速器踏板，等待速度下降。

sentences.english: I came to scootering late in life.
sentences.chinese: 在我的生活中，与踏板车邂逅是很晚的事情了。

sentences.english: Finally, seeing that I had calmed down somewhat, he pointed to the take-off board.
sentences.chinese: 后来，他见我有些平静了，便用手指向踏板。

sentences.english: Bull; Fume aspirator with control pedal to operate at test end.
sentences.chinese: 在实验的最后操作具有控制踏板的烟雾吸气器。

sentences.english: Fully depress and hold down the brake pedal.
sentences.chinese: 完全踩下刹车踏板并踩住不放。

definition: to operate by means of a pedal
to brake (when driving)/to stop/to switch off/to check (bad habits)/a brake
